panels.description: Total number of data file size.
panels.title: Total Storage Size

panels.description: Total number of data rows in the cluster. Calculated by sum of rows from each region.
panels.title: Total Rows

targets.rawSql: SELECT count(*) as datanode FROM information_schema.cluster_info WHERE peer_type = 'DATANODE';
SELECT count(*) as frontend FROM information_schema.cluster_info WHERE peer_type = 'FRONTEND';
SELECT count(*) as metasrv FROM information_schema.cluster_info WHERE peer_type = 'METASRV';
SELECT count(*) as flownode FROM information_schema.cluster_info WHERE peer_type = 'FLOWNODE';

panels.description: The number of the key resources in GreptimeDB.

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) as databases FROM information_schema.schemata WHERE schema_name NOT IN ('greptime_private', 'information_schema')
SELECT COUNT(*) as tables FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema != 'information_schema'
SELECT COUNT(region_id) as regions FROM information_schema.region_peers
SELECT COUNT(*) as flows FROM information_schema.flows

panels.title: Database Resources

panels.description: The data size of wal/index/manifest in the GreptimeDB.

targets.rawSql: SELECT SUM(memtable_size) * 0.42825 as WAL FROM information_schema.region_statistics;
SELECT SUM(index_size) as index FROM information_schema.region_statistics;
SELECT SUM(manifest_size) as manifest FROM information_schema.region_statistics;

panels.title: Data Size

panels.description:
Total ingestion rate.

Here we listed 3 primary protocols:

- Prometheus remote write
- Greptime's gRPC API (when using our ingest SDK)
- Log ingestion http API
panels.title: Total Ingestion Rate

panels.description:
Total ingestion rate.

Here we listed 3 primary protocols:

- Prometheus remote write
- Greptime's gRPC API (when using our ingest SDK)
- Log ingestion http API
panels.title: Ingestion Rate by Type

panels.description:
Total rate of query API calls by protocol. This metric is collected from frontends.

Here we listed 3 main protocols:
- MySQL
- Postgres
- Prometheus API

Note that there are some other minor query APIs like /sql are not included
panels.title: Total Query Rate

targets.expr: sum by(instance, pod, path, method, code) (rate(greptime_servers_http_requests_elapsed_count{instance=~"$frontend",path!~"/health|/metrics"}[$__rate_interval]))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(instance, pod, le, path, method, code) (rate(greptime_servers_http_requests_elapsed_bucket{instance=~"$frontend",path!~"/health|/metrics"}[$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(instance, pod, le, path, code) (rate(greptime_servers_grpc_requests_elapsed_bucket{instance=~"$frontend"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.description: Ingestion rate by row as in each frontend
panels.title: Ingest Rows per Instance

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(instance, pod, le, request_type) (rate(greptime_grpc_region_request_bucket{instance=~"$frontend"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.description: Per-stage time for frontend to handle bulk insert requests

targets.expr: sum by(instance, pod, stage) (rate(greptime_table_operator_handle_bulk_insert_sum[$__rate_interval]))/sum by(instance, pod, stage) (rate(greptime_table_operator_handle_bulk_insert_count[$__rate_interval]))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(instance, pod, stage, le) (rate(greptime_table_operator_handle_bulk_insert_bucket[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: Frontend Handle Bulk Insert Elapsed Time

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(instance, pod, le, type) (rate(greptime_mito_handle_request_elapsed_bucket{instance=~"$datanode"}[$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(instance, pod, le, stage) (rate(greptime_mito_read_stage_elapsed_bucket{instance=~"$datanode"}[$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(instance, pod, le, stage) (rate(greptime_mito_write_stage_elapsed_bucket{instance=~"$datanode"}[$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(instance, pod, le, stage) (rate(greptime_mito_compaction_stage_elapsed_bucket{instance=~"$datanode"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance, pod, stage) (rate(greptime_mito_compaction_stage_elapsed_sum{instance=~"$datanode"}[$__rate_interval]))/sum by(instance, pod, stage) (rate(greptime_mito_compaction_stage_elapsed_count{instance=~"$datanode"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Compaction Elapsed Time per Instance by Stage

panels.description: Write-ahead logs write size as bytes. This chart includes stats of p95 and p99 size by instance, total WAL write rate.
panels.title: WAL write size

panels.description: Raft engine (local disk) log store sync latency, p99

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(le, type, node, instance, pod) (rate(raft_engine_sync_log_duration_seconds_bucket[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: WAL sync duration seconds

panels.description: Write-ahead log operations latency at p99
panels.title: Log Store op duration seconds

panels.description: Per-stage elapsed time for region worker to handle bulk insert region requests.

targets.expr: sum by(instance, stage, pod) (rate(greptime_region_worker_handle_write_sum[$__rate_interval]))/sum by(instance, stage, pod) (rate(greptime_region_worker_handle_write_count[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Region Worker Handle Bulk Insert Requests
Active Series and Field Builders Count

panels.description: Per-stage elapsed time for region worker to decode requests.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(le, instance, stage, pod) (rate(greptime_datanode_convert_region_request_bucket[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(le,instance, stage, pod) (rate(greptime_datanode_convert_region_request_sum[$__rate_interval]))/sum by(le,instance, stage, pod) (rate(greptime_datanode_convert_region_request_count[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Region Worker Convert Requests

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(instance, pod, le, scheme, operation) (rate(opendal_operation_duration_seconds_bucket{instance=~"$datanode",operation=~"read|Reader::read"}[$__rate_interval])))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(instance, pod, le, scheme, operation) (rate(opendal_operation_duration_seconds_bucket{instance=~"$datanode", operation =~ "Writer::write|Writer::close|write"}[$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(instance, pod, le, scheme) (rate(opendal_operation_duration_seconds_bucket{instance=~"$datanode", operation="list"}[$__rate_interval])))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(instance, pod, le, scheme, operation) (rate(opendal_operation_duration_seconds_bucket{instance=~"$datanode", operation!~"read|write|list|Writer::write|Writer::close|Reader::read"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.description: Total traffic as in bytes by instance and operation
panels.title: Opendal traffic

targets.expr: sum by(instance, pod, scheme, operation, error) (rate(opendal_operation_errors_total{instance=~"$datanode", error!="NotFound"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: Counter of region migration by source and destination
panels.title: Region migration datanode

panels.description: Gauge of load information of each datanode, collected via heartbeat between datanode and metasrv. This information is for metasrv to schedule workloads.
panels.title: Datanode load

panels.description: Displays the rate of SQL executions processed by the Meta service using the RDS backend.
panels.title: Rate of SQL Executions (RDS)

panels.description: Measures the response time of SQL executions via the RDS backend.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by(pod, op, type, result, le) (rate(greptime_meta_rds_pg_sql_execute_elapsed_ms_bucket[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: SQL Execution Latency (RDS)

panels.description: Shows latency of Meta handlers by pod and handler name, useful for monitoring handler performance and detecting latency spikes.
panels.title: Handler Execution Latency

panels.description: Shows p90 heartbeat message sizes, helping track network usage and identify anomalies in heartbeat payload.
panels.title: Heartbeat Packet Size

panels.description: Gauge of load information of each datanode, collected via heartbeat between datanode and metasrv. This information is for metasrv to schedule workloads.
panels.title: Meta Heartbeat Receive Rate

panels.description: Gauge of load information of each datanode, collected via heartbeat between datanode and metasrv. This information is for metasrv to schedule workloads.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(pod, le, op, target) (greptime_meta_kv_request_elapsed_bucket))

panels.title: Meta KV Ops Latency

panels.description: Gauge of load information of each datanode, collected via heartbeat between datanode and metasrv. This information is for metasrv to schedule workloads.
panels.title: Rate of meta KV Ops

panels.description: Gauge of load information of each datanode, collected via heartbeat between datanode and metasrv. This information is for metasrv to schedule workloads.
panels.title: DDL Latency
